casebody.data:
Monday, March 3, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

95-2635. McClosky v. Regal Mining, Inc.

Carroll App. No. 650. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Carroll County.

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that oral argument scheduled for March 4, 1997, be, and hereby is, continued until further order of the court.
